Title: Provides a heart disease presumption for certain members employed by the Triborough bridge and tunnel authority
Summary: Provides a heart disease presumption for members employed by the Triborough bridge and tunnel authority as a bridge and tunnel officer, sergeant or lieutenant in a non-managerial position.
LawCode: Add ยง607-m, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to providing a heart disease presumption for certain members employed by the Triborough bridge and tunnel authority
